coreAtributes.authorTag: Carefuly etched into the back of each wing reads "CAREFULY FORGED BY TROOPS #P01-Y & #B100-M "
coreAtributes.name: Bat wing barrette
coreAtributes.description: Black steel barrettes issued by the imperial military for the soldiers that cant keep hair out of their eyes. Its modeled after an imperial bat's wing, only this time theres two. So you can play with them even more than usual.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s barrettes and [npc.verb(flick)] them to the side.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your barrettes and [npc.verb(flick)] them to the side.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s barrettes nd [npc.verb(flick)] them to the side.

replacementText.playerSelf: You clip the barrettes to your hair.
replacementText.playerNPC: You clip the barrettes onto [npc.name]'s hair.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.her] to wear the barrettes.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] clips the barrettes in your hair.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] forces the barrettes onto your hair.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the barrettes in [npc2.her] hair.
